Description: On I-664 at mile marker 15.3 in the City of Chesapeake, near Pughsville Road, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The north right lane and right shoulder are closed.

Description: On I-66 at mile marker 63 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The west right center lane, right lane, and right shoulder are closed.

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 262.8 in the City of Hampton, near Mercury Boulevard, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The east right shoulder is closed.

Description: On ALT US-58 in the County of Wise, in the vicinity of Lawson Hollow Rd, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. All east lanes are closed. All west lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On Rt. 625 North in the County of Prince George, in the vicinity of Holdsworth Rd; Newville Rd; Rt. 625N/S (Sussex County); County/City/Town Line: SUSSEX - PRINCE GEORGE COUNTY LINE, motorists can expect delays due to standing water.
